item.description:
GAME NIGHT IS ON (Wednesday)!! I just got my scehdule for the week, and I'm only working the night job Fri & Sat (oh good....)

Please join me on Wednesday to play board games. I'll update the event when I go home today to tell you what kinds of games that I have at home. (Other games are welcome). I'll email you the address in North Haven - while I do have a longish driveway, to ensure that people do not get blocked in I would recommend parking in the street. BYOB - I will provide snacks. There are cats & dogs in the house, so please take an antihistamine if you feel the need to.

Thanks to everyone to has offered to bring things - how about paper goods? like little plates, napkins, etc? That would be helpful; if you can, just put it in your RSVP so that people know that it's taken care of. Also, I know I said BYOB, but I'm sure that if you wanted to bring a bottle of wine or something no one would complain! Other than that, don't worry - just come and have fun!
item.name: Game night at Devorah's
